about_the_game:
Experience a 2D side-scrolling narrative adventure infused with puzzles and a dash of action, unfurling the compelling story of evolution in the merciless oceans.

Witness the fierce competition among species as they adapt to the harsh environment, mirroring the relentless struggle for survival. As a player, you will navigate this intricate web of existence, making crucial decisions, confronting perils, and unraveling the concealed secrets of evolution.



Visual Style



  • A captivating play of light and darkness takes center stage, evoking a constant duality.
  • Vivid splashes of color punctuate a predominantly grayscale world.
  • The ocean's depths, shrouded in mystery, blend realism with a touch of fantasy.
  • A seamless, interface-free integration ensures an organic gameplay experience.


Mechanics



  • Explore a spectrum of uses: charge, electrocute, create nests, and witness your species evolve progressively.
  • Unleash special evolutionary abilities, from shining brightly to biting ferociously.
  • Genre amalgamation: narrative adventure, puzzle, action, combat.
  • An organic feeding system.
  • Solve puzzles, secure scarce food sources, confront enemies, evade the formidable, and defeat colossal bosses.


Progression



  • Levels/maps feature diverse zones: Exploration, Puzzle, Action, and Story Development.
  • Save progress at nests.
  • Visual progression unfolds from the ocean's depths to the surface, marked by enhanced lighting and evolving flora and fauna.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - 8300H 2.3Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 - 4GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - 9300H 2.4Ghz
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650 - 4GB

short_description: A small creature is born in the depths of the ocean, beginning its journey for survival in a ruthless world. Embark on a 2D adventure full of exploration and puzzles, making crucial decisions, facing dangers and discovering the hidden secrets of evolution.
